summary: The video features a series of messages of support directed towards students participating in pro-Palestinian protests at various college campuses. The messages express gratitude, respect, and love for the students, acknowledging their efforts and solidarity with the children in Gaza. The video includes text overlays highlighting the involvement of students from universities like Harvard and Columbia, emphasizing the widespread nature of these protests and the international support they are receiving.
keywords: Pro-Palestinian, protests, college campuses, Harvard University, Columbia University, students, Gaza, support, respect, love, message
